name: Cray UK Limited
goal:
Cray is a global leader in supercomputing and provides highly advanced systems and solutions and world-class service and support to government, industry and academia.

Leveraging 40 years of experience in developing the world’s most advanced supercomputers, Cray offers a comprehensive portfolio of high performance computing systems as well as storage and data analytics solutions delivering sustained performance, scalability and reliability on a wide range of applications. Additionally, Cray’s technologies are available in configurations to meet customers’ varying budgets and needs.

The European organisation covers the full spectrum of enterprise activities: Sales & Marketing, Technical Presales, Customer Service, Application Support & Benchmarking, Product R&D, the Cray EMEA Research Lab, and G&A functions.
interests: Digital economy and society, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Cray currently is mainly following the EC's HPC activities under the H2020 and previous framework programmes.
